Body:
choice_list = [0, 1, False, 'Test']
hd = ctor(choice_list)
samples = get_many_samples_for(hd)
z0 = Counter(samples).get(0)
z1 = Counter(samples).get(1)
zNone = Counter(samples).get(False)
zTest = Counter(samples).get('Test')
assert z0 > NUM_TRIALS * 0.2
assert z1 > NUM_TRIALS * 0.2
assert zNone > NUM_TRIALS * 0.2
assert zTest > NUM_TRIALS * 0.2
assert abs(hd.pdf(0) - 1 / 4) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.pdf(1) - 1 / 4) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.pdf(False) - 1 / 4) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.pdf('Test') - 1 / 4) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.cdf(0) - 1 / 4) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.cdf(1) - 2 / 4) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.cdf(False) - 3 / 4) < 1e-06
assert hd.cdf('Test') == 1.0
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    assert hd.pdf(3) == 0.0
    assert hd.cdf(3) == 0.0
assert hd.min() == 0
assert hd.max() == len(choice_list)
assert abs(hd.mean() - (len(choice_list) - 1) / 2) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.var() - (len(choice_list) ** 2 - 1) / 12) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.std() - math.sqrt((len(choice_list) ** 2 - 1) / 12)) < 1e-06
samples_index = [get_index_in_list_with_bool(choice_list, sample) for
    sample in samples]
assert abs((hd.mean() - np.mean(samples_index)) / hd.mean()) < 0.1
assert abs((hd.var() - np.var(samples_index)) / hd.var()) < 0.1
pytest.mark.parametrize('ctor', [Choice, PriorityChoice])
